title: Sequencer Pro+
description: Access Powerful Sequencer Tools and Overrides
longDescription:
Sequencer Pro+ is a comprehensive toolkit designed to streamline your workflow within Unreal Engine's Sequencer. Whether you're a seasoned filmmaker or a novice creator, Sequencer Pro+ equips you with a suite of powerful features to enhance your storytelling capabilities.


Sequencer Pro+ is a powerful tool designed to enhance your workflow within the sequencer environment. With features like object visibility overrides, sequence management, FBX import/export, and timeline adjustments, Sequencer Pro+ consolidates essential functionalities into a single, user-friendly tool.


Gone are the days of cumbersome processes to manipulate objects on a sequence level or create mattes. Whether you need to remove an object from a sequence, generate mattes, or preserve shadows for hidden actors, Sequencer Pro+ simplifies these tasks.


KEY FEATURES:

1. Create and Open Sequences:

Easily create and move between sequences with in one tool.


2. Import/Export Cameras:

Unlock new possibilities for collaboration and post-production with Sequencer Pro+'s FBX integration capabilities. Effortlessly export cameras as FBX files for seamless integration into external editing software, then import FBX Cameras back into Sequencer to maintain your project's continuity.


3. Create Mattes:

Experience unparalleled convenience with Sequencer Pro+'s array of utilities for managing object visibility. Create mattes in viewport in a instant.


4. Shadow Casting:

Seamlessly integrate shadow passes into your scenes by easily tracing actors and objects for shadow passes,


Sequencer Pro+ empowers you to take full control of your cinematic vision. Effortlessly create and manipulate cameras, orchestrate sequences, and fine-tune every aspect of your timeline. With adjustable frame rates and timeline controls, you have the flexibility to craft cinematic experiences that captivate audiences and bring your vision to life.


Discover the ultimate toolkit for elevating your Sequencer projects to new heights with Sequencer Pro+. Unlock the power of precision, efficiency, and creativity, and unleash your storytelling potential like never before.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Create Viewport Mattes
  •  Create Viewport Shadow Passes
  •  Import/Export Cameras
  • Navigate and create Sequences
  • Full control over sequence timeline

Number of Blueprints: 1



Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


Documentation: Documentation PDF is included with File.


Important/Additional Notes:


Prerequisites:


Before utilizing Sequencer Pro+, ensure the following prerequisites are met:

1. In the project settings, find "Enable Alpha Channel Support in Post Processing (Experimental)" and set it to linear color space only.

2. Find "Custom Depth Stencil Pass" by searching in project settings and set it to "Enabled with Stencil".

releaseInfo.releaseNote:
Small Fixes for Matte Actor

Added reset for each individual object visibility.
